title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7441.9 - Environmental health and safety inspections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7441.9 - Environmental health and safety inspections

State Regulations
(a) The facility director, or person acting
in that capacity, shall designate one or more staff members to conduct regular
environmental health and safety inspections of all areas of the facility to
determine whether an environmental hazard exists, and shall take the necessary
action to correct any such hazard. (b) Such inspections shall be conducted at
least once every week, and the results of such inspections shall be recorded in
a facility log maintained for such purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

7441.9

New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
